amendment.description: An amendment numbered 156 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to either alter or terminate the Interagency Agreement between the U.S. Departments of Labor and Agriculture that governs the Job Corps Civilian Conservation Center (CCC) program, and to prohibit any funds in the bill from being used to close any of the 25 CCCs that are currently operating.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Newhouse amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
